Remarks: Frame cap riveted to skin. Inspect for corrosion and rivet pull-through.
Primary frame in mid-cabin; fatigue critical at cutouts.
Inspect for cracks at rivet lines and web buckling.
Primary cap under wing carry-through. FEA substantiation required for repairs.
Scarf repair allowed per PROC_51-42-01. Monitor NVD (C-scan).
Minor delamination limits apply. Use certified materials only.
High-load area near door cutout. Ply orientation critical.
Check core crush and bondline void fraction.
Supports cabin floor loads. Torque retention critical.
Shear splice between frames. Inspect for fretting/corrosion.
Inspect FPI for cracks; fastener torque retention limits apply.
Local repair allowed if within dimensional and load limits.
